inn1.comm: good length delivery on middle and off, Gambhir stays in his crease and defends

bowled him! Vaas pitched the ball on a good length around off stump and angled it into the left-hander, Gambhir played all around the line of the ball and it went though the gap between his bat and pad to hit off stump
good length once again outside off stump, pushed on the off side on the front foot
Raina moves back and pushes another good length delivery off his hips towards the leg side, Vaas has been spot on with his length so far
Raina gets behind the line of a good length ball and defends on the off side
Raina moves back and across and nudges a ball that's slightly shorter towards square leg for a single, Kohli will have to wait a bit longer for his first ball in  ODIs
what happened there, Raina came forward and tried to close the face of the bat, he was early on the shot and the ball hit high on the bat and lobbed up on the off side
Raina pushes forward at one that slants across him from over the wicket and gets beaten
good length delivery pitches around off stump and seams away from the left-hander, Raina lets it pass  through to Sangakkara
it's a similar sort of delivery but the line is much further away from off stump, Doctrove calls it wide
splendid ball, Kulasekara pitches the ball in line with the stumps and seams it across Raina who gets squared up and beaten as he tries to defend
defended on the back foot towards the leg side
tight line and length on off and middle stump, defended off the front foot towards the off side
Vaas tests the teenager with his stock ball, the one that angles across the right-hander and then straightens, Kohli defends with bat close to the front pad
this time he doesn't straighten it and instead takes the ball away from Kohli who gets beaten on the forward push
another one seams across the right-hander and Kohli moves forward and opens the face to play the ball towards third man
Raina stays in his crease and punches a good length ball towards mid-off
fuller delivery angling into middle and off stump, Raina strides forward and defends on the off side
cut him in half! Vaas pitches the ball short of a length and angles it into the left-hander, Raina tries to drive on the up off the back foot but the ball beats the inside edge of his bat
Kohli gets a touch squared up by one that slants across him and the thick outside edge runs towards third man
Raina waits in his crease for a good length delivery and opens the face to play it towards third man

huge appeal for leg before but Doctrove says not out! Kulasekara pitches the ball on a good length and nips it back into the right-hander, Kohli tries to play across the line but gets hit on the back leg, it was a bit too high and he may have got an inside edge as well, Doctrove did not signal leg byes, there are no reviews for the ODI series
fuller ball and Raina drives firmly towards mid-off where Jayasuriya dives to his left and saves runs
good length and the angle of the ball takes it past the off stump after Raina lets it go
played off the pads towards midwicket, he isn't finding the gap at the moment
Vaas keeps it tight around off stump, Kohli moves forward and plays the ball behind square on the off side
the ball isn't coming on to the bat, Kohli moves forward to a good length ball outside off and drives towards cover
wicket-to-wicket line and the length is immaculate, Kohli gets behind the line and defends on the leg side
Kohli stays in his crease and defends the ball towards backward point
Kohli plants his front foot forward and tries to drive away from his body, Vaas pitches the ball outside off and slants it away from the right-hander, Kohli gets beaten
Kohli moves his feet better this time and punches a good length delivery that's slightly wide through cover, he'll get three for it
Kulasekara tests Kohli with a short ball and the batsman ducks under it
that one pitched on a good length outside off and nipped back a long way into the right-hander, Kohli was extremely late in reacting and the ball cut him in half
this time the length is a touch fuller and Kohli moves across and nudges towards the leg side
good length on off and middle, Kohli moves across his stumps and plays the ball on the leg side
the length is a bit too full outside off and Kohli drives off the front foot through the gap between cover and point
Kohli waits on the front foot for a good length delivery to reach him and drives towards cover, he doesn't find the gap this time
Raina tries to slog him down the ground but mis-times it
a bit too straight this time and Raina works the ball off his pads through the midwicket region
that's the first boundary of the innings, Kohli moves a touch across, leans forward, and flicks a full ball through square leg
pushed off the front foot towards cover
Vaas gets the ball to straighten into the right-hander from a good length, Kohli defends on the off side
Kohli moves forward and across and nudges the ball off his pads towards midwicket
tight line and length around off and middle, Raina gets behind the line and blocks on the leg side
shot! Kulasekara gave Raina too much room outside off stump, Raina hardly moved his feet but managed to drive the ball on the up wide of the fielder at mid-off for four
the length is better and the line is closer to off stump, Raina defends on the back foot
Raina stays in his crease and guides a good length delivery towards third man

lbw! Kulasekara pitches the ball on a good length just outside off stump and nips it back into the right-hander, Kohli gets half a stride forward and tries to drive, the ball beats the inside edge of the bat and crashes into the back pad in front of off stump, that is plumb and Doctrove sends Kohli on his way
Kulasekara greets him with one that hits an excellent length around middle and off and slants across the left-hander, Yuvraj gets squared up and beaten on the back foot
Raina moves back in his crease and defends a good length ball towards the off side
tight line and length around off stump, Raina defends towards a fielder placed at short cover, he's there for the airy drive played on the up
Raina defends on the front foot with bat close to front pad
Raina jumps back in his crease to a short of a length ball and nudges off his hips behind square for a single
Yuvraj strides forward to a good length ball and defends on the off side
Yuvraj pushes forward at a delivery which leaves him and gets an outside edge, the ball falls short and slightly wide of Jayawardene at first slip
Yuvraj strides forward and drives towards mid-on
such timing! Yuvraj merely pushes that off his pads but his high back lift generates enough momentum to send the ball through midwicket to the boundary
wider outside the off stump, left alone by Yuvraj
Yuvraj stays in his crease and defends a good length ball on the off side
Yuvraj gets on to the front foot and plays the square drive, the fielder at point dives to his right and saves runs

dropped! And it was a sitter! Yuvraj plays away from his body at a good length delivery and gets a thick outside edge that flies at head height to Jayawardene at second slip, he ball hits his hands and falls out
leans forward to push a length delivery to cover point
allows the ball to come to him to work to midwicket
gets forward and mistimes a drive to covers
cutting in a touch, around  the off stump, from back of length and that allows him to work it to square leg
fuller, just outside the off stump, squeezed to point
fuller, on the off and middle, Yuvraj stopped his front foot movement and got his bat in an angle from the off stump line to drive to mid-on.
length delivery around the middle and leg line, goes back to turn it to midwicket
beaten again. Raina doesn't quite lean forward but goes through with his off drive and the ball seams away from the outside edge. There has been some help for the seamers today.
drags it short of length and Raina likes them there. A pull shot to the midwicket boundary.
corrects his length - hits the fuller region and keeps it straight on the middle - driven back to him
Raina's urge to drive on the up has terminated his stay. It was the full length delivery outside off stump and Raina drove and straight to the trap laid at short cover. India continue to wobble.
just short of a length, holding its line outside off squeezed to point.
good length delivery on off stump, defended on the front foot
Vaas keeps it on a tight length and line around off stump, Yuvraj stays in his crease and defends on the off side
Yuvraj moves forward and outside the line of off stump and gets hit on the pad
Yuvraj moves on to the front foot and defends a good length ball towards point
Yuvraj gets a touch squared up by Vaas and the outside edge runs wide of a wide slip
defended on the front foot towards the off side by Sharma
Yuvraj moves into his crease and punches a ball on the up towards the left of the fielder at cover
the short of a length delivery bounces outside the off stump and beats Sharma's attempted drive on the up
fuller ball on off and middle stump, Sharma defends on the front foot
defended on the leg side by Sharma
good length delivery on off stump, defended off the back foot on the off side
Sharma drives a full ball past the bowler and it looks like a certain boundary until Jayasuriya catches up with it and dives to prevent four, splendid effort
Sharma moves forward and defends a good length ball on the off side
Thushara gets the ball to bounce a bit from outside off stump, Sharma gets caught on the hop as he tries to play the ball on the off side and is beaten
short of a length outside off stump, punched off the back foot towards point
Sharma moves forward to a good length delivery and gets an outside edge which bounces twice before reaching second slip
short of a length outside off stump, Sharma lets it go through to Sangakkara
Sharma stays in his crease and plays a good length ball behind square on the off side
good length ball on middle and off, Sharma defends back past the bowler and wants the single, Yuvraj sends him back and Sharma has to dive to make his ground at the keeper's end
short of a length on off stump, Sharma stays on the back foot and defends on the off side
he's clobbered that! Sharma steps out of his crease and swings a length ball from Vaas over the midwicket boundary, superbly hit
fuller length and Sharma flicks the ball off his pads through square leg
good length delivery on off stump, pushed off the back foot towards cover
Sharma moves back in his crease and plays the ball off his pads towards midwicket
Thushara keeps it on a good length just outside off stump, Yuvraj lifts his bat out of the way
Thushara angles the ball into the left-hander from over the wicket, Yuvraj is cramped for room and he pushes the ball towards midwicket for a single
Sharma opens the face of the bat and guides the ball towards third man, Sharma runs quickly and completes the second
the good length ball bounces a bit more and seams across the right-hander, Sharma lets it go
137kmh outside the off stump, Sharma covers his off stump and shoulders arms
Sharma defends a good length delivery, which straightens into him, towards the off side
short of a length outside off stump, Yuvraj drives on the up off the front foot and splits the gap at cover
Vaas cramps Yuvraj for room with one that angles into off and middle stump, Yuvraj defends on the off side
Yuvraj leans forward and lifts a full ball off his pads towards deep backward square leg
good length on off stump, Yuvraj strides forward and defends with a  straight bat
Yuvraj plants his front foot forward and lofts Vaas over wide mid-on for four, he hit that with a lot of power and picked the gap
defended on the back foot towards the off side
short of a length on off stump, Sharma defends off the front foot towards point
short ball and the line is wide outside off stump, Sharma gets on top of the bounce and steers it wide of the solitary slip to the third man boundary
defended on the back foot towards the off side
Sharma strides forward and pushes a good length ball towards backward point where  Dilshan dives to his left and stops the ball
Thushara bowls a short ball over off stump and Sharma sways out of the line of the ball
another short of a length ball outside off stump, Sharma drops his wrists and lets it pass
he's beaten two men with his first ball, both Yuvraj and Sangakkara, Yuvraj pushed forward at a quicker straighter one and beat the inside edge, that was very close to off stump
huge appeal for lbw, that one pitched in line with leg stump and struck Yuvraj on the front pad as he pushed forward, that was extremely close, he might have been given had there been a review system
Yuvraj replies with aggression, he lofts a full ball powerfully over the long-on boundary

bowled him! Mendis bowls the quicker one, Yuvraj lunges forward in defence and plays away from his body, he gets an inside edge on to his stumps, what an eventful first over and Mendis has come back strongly after being hit for six
Dhoni goes on to the back foot and defends the ball late on the off side
defended on the front foot
Sharma moves forward and flicks a fuller ball off his pads through square leg
Dhoni moves back in his crease and pushes a short of a length ball towards point for a single

caught! India are unraveling quickly! Sharma stayed rooted to the crease and poked at a short of a length delivery outside off stump, he got a thick edge that flew at a comfortable pace at waist height to Jayawardene at first slip, catches don't come much easier than that
Pathan moves on to the back foot and defends a short of a length delivery towards the off side
Dhoni moves back and across and defends a good length delivery towards cover
defended on the back foot
Pathan lunges forward and defends towards short cover
defended back to the bowler
bowled quicker through the air on leg and middle, Pathan moves forward and defends towards short leg
defended off the front foot towards cover
Pathan lunges forward and defends a straighter one from Mendis
Pathan pushes forward and away from his body and gets an outside edge towards third man
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Dhoni just about gets out of the line of the ball in time
defended on the back foot by Dhoni, Thushara has been bowling a a short of a length unlike Vaas and Kulasekara who have bowled a touch fuller
short ball and Dhoni attempts to pull the ball, he doesn't connect well but will get a single
nudged off the pads towards the leg side for  single
Dhoni stands on the back foot and drives a good length ball towards cover
short of a length on leg and middle, Dhoni stays on the back foot and works the ball off his hips towards square leg
Dhoni lunges forward to a legbreak from Mendis and gets squared up, he was looking to play on the leg side but the ball hit the outside edge and went on the off side
Dhoni waits on the back foot and pushes the ball into the gap at cover
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Dhoni pushes forward in defence but gets beaten by one that turns away from him
Dhoni moves back and tries to cut but Mendis beats him with a googly
Dhoni defends on the front foot towards the leg side, that was more of a thick inside edge
the length is a bit fuller and Pathan cashes in, he drives the ball on the up through cover, Dilshan sprints after it and slides to pull the ball back in just before going over the boundary
Dhoni moves forward and pushes the ball towards mid-off
Dhoni moves back and across to a good length delivery and defends on the off side
Dhoni jumps back and across to a short of a length delivery that rises into his ribs, he defends awkwardly on the leg side
Dhoni moves towards the off side and works the ball off his body towards square leg
Thushara goes round the wicket and angles the ball across the left-hander, Pathan drives on the up towards cover
defended on the back foot towards the off side
Dhoni moves forward and blocks on the leg side
bowled slower through the air and fuller, Dhoni moves forward and defends
played back to the bowler on the back foot
Dhoni moves back to a quicker delivery - 100 kmh - and defends back to the bowler
Mendis completes a maiden over, he finishes with a quicker ball outside off which Dhoni defends on the back foot
he rips the offbreak across the left-hander, Pathan tries to cut but gets betaen
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
tossed up on leg and middle stump, Pathan defends on the front foot
Pathan strides forward and defends on the off side, Murali is giving the ball air
this one is flatter outside leg stump, it turns into Pathan who tries to work it off his pads but misses
Pathan moves back and defends towards Murali, he begins with a maiden, that's two in a row now
Dhoni pushes the ball on the off side and wants the single, he doesn't get it

caught!! Dhoni moves back and tries to cut a ball that's much too close to off stump, it turned ever so slightly away from the right-hander as well, the outside edge flies quickly to Jayawardene who takes a sharp catch at first slip
bowled quick and straight on middle and off, Harbhajan strides forward and blocks
massive appeal for lbw! Harbhajan gets hit on the pad by one that pitches around middle and goes towards middle and leg, that was close, might have hit leg stump
defended on the back foot
another maiden, Harbhajan doesn't get bat on ball, that's three in a row now
tossed up on middle stump, Pathan leans forward and blocks
Pathan moves on to the front foot and blocks

lbw! Asoka de Silva took his time but finally raised the finger, Pathan lunged forward to defend but got hit on the pad in front of middle, the ball pitched in line as well, he was a long way forward and the only doubt was whether it would have missed off, whoops replays show an inside edge on to pad so Pathan was unlucky
Zaheer tries to cut his first ball but gets beaten
Zaheer moves back and attempts to play the ball on the off side, he doesn't make contact
defended back to the bowler, that's four maidens in a row now
Mendis pitches the offbreak on off stump, Harbhajan moves forward to defend
loud appeal for lbw once again, Harbhajan moves outside the line of off stump to sweep and got hit on the pad
Zaheer moves forward to defend
bowled fuller on off stump, Zaheer moves on to the front foot and defends
Zaheer stretches forward and defends with bat close to pad
Zaheer comes on to the front foot to defend but gets hit on the pad. There was a leg bye in this over but India haven't scored off the bat in the last five overs.
Harbhajan gets down on one knee and sweeps towards deep backward square leg, that's the first run in five overs
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Zaheer tries to work the ball off his pads but gets hit on the outside of his front pad
defended on the front foot towards the off side, he's pushed it into the gap so there's a single available
Harbhajan sweeps Murali once again to deep backward square leg
Zaheer dabs the ball towards point and sprints the single
defended on the front foot on the off side
bowled flat and fast on off and middle, Zaheer defends on the front foot
Zaheer lunges forward and defends on the off side
another front foot defence with bat close to front pad
Zaheer defends on the leg side and wants the single, Sangakkara runs across to prevent it
Zaheer moves forward and drives towards cover, yet another maiden
tossed up on middle and leg stump, Harbhajan moves forward and flicks the ball behind square
bowled full on middle from round the wicket, Zaheer nudges the ball towards the leg side
Harbhajan attempts to sweep again but this time the line is wide outside off stump, Harbhajan misses and Sangakkara whips off the bails
Harbhajan comes forward and tries to flick, he misses and gets hit on the pad outside the line of off stump
played on the leg side for a single
bowled full and flat outsid eoff stump, Zaheer tries to drive but the thick edge rolls behind point
Zaheer tries to drive on the leg side but the inside edge goes towards square leg
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Zaheer moves forward and drives a full ball on the up towards cover
defended on the front foot towards point
bowled flatter through teh air and the pace was slower as well, Zaheer  blocks off the front foot
driven off the back foot towards long off for a single
tossed up from round the wicket across the right-hander, Zaheer defends on the front foot
played back to the bowler on the front foot
Zaheer pushes off the front foot and gets an outside edge which evades first slip
pushed off the front foot towards the off side
tossed up on off stump, Harbhajan moves forward and blocks, he's pushed it into a gap near cover point and will get a single
Zaheer gets beaten outside the off stump
tossed up outside off stump, Harbhajan plays the ball to cover
driven off the front foot towards cover once again
Harbhajan comes forward, closes the face, and plays the ball towards long-on
bowled slowly through the air on middle stump, Zaheer comes forward and defends
Zaheer gets on to the front foot and defends on the off side
he's hit that with the middle of the bat but it's a front-foot defensive shot, another tidy over zips past with India stuck in mire
Harbhajan sweeps once again and manages to beat the fielder at short fine leg, he didn't think there was a second but there was one on offer
played on the off side through the gap at cover
Zaheer tries to sweep this time but misses and gets hit on the pad
Murali pitches the ball outside off stump and rips the off break back into the right-hander, Zaheer cuts but gets beaten
cut off the back foot towards deep point

caught in the deep! Zaheer's patience wears out and he tries to slog Murali over the midwicket boundary, he hasn't connected well enough and Thushara takes a few steps back at deep midwicket and holds a well-judged catch, he looks back to see if he's inside the boudnary and he is!
there's a mix up but Ojha is safe, he had pushed it towards cover point and set off for the single, Harbhajan sent him back, Sangakkara didn't collect
played towards short third man
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Ojha defends on the off side
Ojha pushes forward and gets an outside edge that runs towards third man
defended towards the leg side
Harbhajan takes a large stride outside off stump and sweeps Murali with the angle towards deep square leg
flighted delivery on middle stump, Ojha gets on to the front foot and the ball hits his outside edge
defended on the front foot towards the off side
flatter and quicker on middle and off stump, Ojha pushes forward and opens the face of the bat to play the ball to short third man
Ojha pushes forward to defend and gets a bit of inside edge on to the pad
driven off the front foot towards mid-off
Harbhajan drives the ball off the front foot towards long on
Ojha plays the ball back to the bowler
Ojha pushes the ball through the gap at cover point for a single
Harbhajan drives a slower ball firmly through extra cover for one more
Ojha moves forward and tries to play the ball on the leg side but gets an inside edge
Harbhajan moves back and plays the ball towards mid-on, he runs the single once the ball beats Jayasuriya who had run to his right to try and cut it off
Harbhajan strides forward and defends on the off side
Harbhajan lunges forward and sweeps the ball past the fielder at short fine leg, Vaas at deep backward square leg does the fielding
swept once again but this time he doesn't beat short fine leg
the doosra beats Harbhajan's outside edge, that was tossed up and it spun and bounced away from Harbhajan as he tried to defend on the front foot
played towards cover off the front foot
beaten outside the off stump once again
bowled quickly through the air on leg stump, that was the off break, Ojha defends on the front foot

huge shout for lbw, Mendis bowls a full ball which hits Ojha on the pad as he tries to defend on the front foot, that pitched on middle stump but it was too tough to say whether it hit pad or bat first
defended on the leg side off the front foot
Ojha moves back and prods on the leg side
Ojha pushes forward at an offbreak and the outside edge falls short of first slip
Harbhajan's walked, he moved back to cut the doosra from outside off stump, the ball hit the bottom edge of the bat and Kumar Sangakkara took a simple catch, Harbhajan didn't even wait for a decision
Munaf stays in his crease and cuts a big offbreak towards first slip
Munaf takes his bottom hand off the bat as he sweeps the ball past the fielder at deep square leg, he's managed to find the boundary!
quicker ball on middle and off, Munaf defends on the off side
Munaf defends towards silly point, it's a Test-match field at the moment
Murali ends the over with the doosra and it's too good for Munaf, he leans forward but gets beaten by the turn away from him
Mendis hits Ojha on the pad and appeals for lbw, that pitched outside leg
Ojha tries to sweep and doesn't make proper contact, however, he's placed it fine enough to get runs
bowled full and fast outside off stump, Munaf plays it back to the bowler
Munaf defends on the leg side
Munaf moves back in his crease and plays on the off side
dropped! Munaf tries to hit the ball over long on but he's mis-timed it, Jayasuriya runs back and tries to get under the catch, he hasn't got into a good position and can't hold on
Ojha pushes forward in defence but gets beaten
Ojha tries to work the ball off his pads but misses
Ojha slog-sweeps Murali with one hand and lofts the ball into the gap at deep square leg, Mendis dives on the boundary but can't prevent it
pushed on the off side for a single
Munaf clears his front foot out of the way and slogs Murali high over deep midwicket, he's connected well enough for the ball to clear the boundary
played down the ground for a single
Munaf lunges forward and pushes the ball into the gap at cover point
Mendis strays down leg side, Munaf swings but can't connect, wide called
defended towards cover off the front foot
Munaf once again takes his bottom hand off the bat as he sweeps towards deep backward square leg
Ojha takes a step down and slog-sweeps towards deep midwicket
bowled! Mendis bowls a wicket-to-wicket line and the ball keeps low as well, Munaf moves towards the leg side and tries to play on the off, he misses and the ball hits leg stump

inn2.comm: Munaf starts with a good length delivery that's slightly outside off stump, Jayasuriya tries to cut the ball but hits it into the ground towards point for a single
short of a length delivery outside off stump at 137 kmh, Sangakkara wafts but misses
good length delivery pitches around middle and slants across the left-hander, Sangakkara pushes towards the off side on the back foot
fuller length on off stump, Sangakkara stays in his crease and defends towards the bowler
a good length delivery lifts sharply from outside the left-hander's off stump, Sangakkara lets it go through to Dhoni

short of a length outside off stump, Sangakkara uses the room on offer and cuts the ball firmly through point, Ojha runs to his left from third man and dives, he gets hand to the ball but can't stop it from touching the rope
Jayasuriya moves forward and tries to drive the ball through cover point, he gets a thick outside edge and his powerful bottom hand ensures that he gets enough elevation to clear point
Jayasuriya moves forward to push the ball on the leg side and gets a thick inside edge on to the pad
good length ball on off stump, Sangakkara moves forward and defends on the off side
Zaheer angles a full ball into the left-hander, Sangakkara moves forward to drive and gets an inside edge on to the pad
Zaheer pitches short of a length outside off and seams the ball away from the left-hander, Sangakkara stays on the back foot and tries to drive on the up, he gets beaten
fuller length on off and middle, Sangakkara moves forward and blocks
that's rather unorthodox, Jayasuriya tries to cut a good length ball from wide outside off stump, he gets a thick bottom edge that bounces over Dhoni's head and runs to the boundary
Jayasuriya strides forward and defends a good length ball from off stump to the off side
Jayasuriya gets behidn the line of a good length ball and defends

excellent ball, Munaf pitches the ball on a good length around middle stump and seams it just outside the left-hander's off stump, Jayasuriya has no room to work with and gets beaten as he tries to fend from his crease
the line is a bit too straight and Jayasuriya works the ball off his hips behind square
a touch too straight once again and this time Sangakkara moves back and nudges the ball off his hips for one more
good length delivery outside off stump, Sangakkara lets it go through to Dhoni
fuller length on middle and off, Sangakkara moves forward and pushes the ball towards mid-off
Sangakkara moves across in his crease and defends a good length ball from off stump towards the leg side
that's an ambitious shot, Sangakkara tried to come down and loft Zaheer back over his head, the length wasn't full enough for the shot and he was beaten by the movement away from the left-hander
Sangakkara picks up the short length early and pulls off the front foot towards Munaf at deep square leg
short of a length outside off stump, Sangakkara stays in his crease and lets the ball go
good length delivery just outside off stump, Jayasuriya doesn't have enough room to cut the ball past point
Jayasuriya backs away towards leg and tries to blast a fuller ball through the off side, he gets beaten
Munaf pitches the ball on a good length around middle and squares Jayasuriya up with the movement across him, he gets an edge on to his pad
Jayasuriya moves forward and pushes the ball firmly towards Harbhajan's left at mid-off for a single
short of a length outside off stump, Sangakkara cuts but mis-times it and gets a thick bottom edge into the ground
fuller length on middle and leg, Sangakkara tries to flick but mis-times the shot towards square leg
good length delivery just outside off stump, Sangakkara moves back and lets it go
too full outside off stump, Sangakkara moves forward and drives the ball hard towards Kohli at cover, a little bit to either side  of the fielder and that would have been four
Zaheer pitches on a good length just outside off and angles into the left-hander, the ball hits the pad and Zaheer appeals but the impact was too high
Sangakkara tries to work the ball on the leg side but gets hit on the thigh pad
tight line and length just outside off stump, Sangakkara lets the ball go through to Dhoni
good length delivery angling into middle stump, Sangakkara moves across and defends towards midwicket, Zaheer completes the first maiden over of the innings
short of a length on middle and off stump, Jayasuriya moves across and defends on the leg side

caught! Jayasuriya takes two steps out of his crease and tries to hit Munaf over the leg side, the length is short and he is cramped for room by the line, the ball hits the top edge and goes high in the air towards mid-on where Irfan Pathan settles under the catch
Jayawardene dabs a good length ball towards the leg side and calls for the single
too full on off stump, Sangakkara strides forward, presents the full face of the bat, and drives to mid-off where Harbhajan fields
Sangakkara stays in his crease and defends a good length ball on the legs die
Munaf pitches short of a length and pushes Sangakkara into his crease, the batsman defends towards the bowler
good length delivery pitches outside off stump and slants away from the right-hander, Jayawardene lets it go
straighter line on off and middle stump, the ball straightens into the right-hander and Jayawardene closes the face to play it on the leg side
this one slants across Jayawardene who lets it go close to his off stump
defended on the front foot towards cover
too full and too wide outside off stump, Jayawardene strides out to the half-volley and drives the ball through the gap at cover, superb timing
excellent reply from Zaheer, he pitches around middle stump and squares Jayawardene with the angle across the right-hander, the ball misses the outside edge and passes close to off stump
short of a length outside off stump, Sangakkara waits on the back foot and plays the ball towards cover
short of a length outside off stump, Sangakkara moves back and drives the ball through the gap at cover
good length delivery on off and middle stump, defended back towards the bowler
width offered outside the off stump and Jayawardene reaches out, gets a long stride in, and drives the ball through cover point for four more
Munaf angles the ball into the right-hander, pitches short of a length and seams away from Jayawardene who defends inside the line and gets beaten
played towards point off the back foot
full length on middle and leg, Sangakkara flicks through midwicket
excellent ball, Zaheer angles it into the left-hander, hits a good length and then seams it away from the left-hander, Sangakkara begins to prod but pulls his bat out of the way
Sangakkara tries to drive on the off side but gets an inside edge towards the leg side
good length delivery outside off stump, left alone by Jayawardene
good length ball outside off stump, Jayawardene moves forward and defends on the off side
Jayawardene lets a good length ball which slants across his off stump pass through to Dhoni
good length delivery on off stump, Sangakkara gets behind the line and defends
tight line and length on off stump, defended back to the bowler on the back foot
Sangakkara moves across his stumps and flicks the ball off his pads towards long leg
defended on the front foot towards the bowler, Munaf's bowled an excellent line but India need more wickets from him
Munaf bowls an excellent slower ball which beats Jayawardene's defense, the ball bounces just in front of Dhoni and beats him too, Gambhir gives chase but can't haul it in
played off the back foot towards point
played off the pads on the leg side
short ball outside off stump, Sangakkara sees the width on offer and cuts the ball hard through cover for four
the length is a fraction short and Sangakkara pulls towards Yuvraj at midwicket
the length is a bit short and Jayawardene moves inside the line of the ball and pulls it to Harbhajan at long leg
left alone by the batsman, that one moved away from Sangakkara
Sangakkara moves forward and towards leg to make room, Irfan follows him and Sangakkara ends up chipping a full length ball towards the off side
short of a length outside off stump, Jayawardene defends on the off side
good length on off stump, Jayawardene moves forward and blocks
fuller length on off and middle, Jayawardene moves forward and defends on the off side
defended on the back foot towards point

caught! Munaf pitches on a good length around middle and seams the ball away from the left-hander, Sangakkara closes the face and tries to play on the leg side, he gets a leading edge back to the bowler and Munaf takes a simple catch
he gets squared up by a good length ball and the outside edge runs towards third man
Kapugedera leans forward to nudge a good length ball on the leg side but misses and gets hit high on the pad, Zaheer runs across to field
good length but the line is too wide outside off stump for Kapugedera to be interested in playing a shot
that's terribly far outside off stump, Asoka de Silva calls it wide
short of a length outside off stump, Kapugedera jumps on to the back foot and drives the ball on the up towards cover
Irfan hits the pad with one that bends back into the right-hander after angling across the batsman, Kapugedera pushes forward in defence and gets an inside edge on to the pad
Irfan bowls a short ball but unfortunately for him it's too short, Asoka de Silva signals the second wide of the over
fuller length on off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
short of a length but the line is on middle and leg, Jayawardene moves across and nudges the ball off his hips towards square leg
Kapugedera moves across and flicks the ball off his pads once again, Munaf's line is a bit too straight at the moment
Kapugedera stays in his crease and pushes the ball towards point
good length delivery on middle stump, Kapugedera strides forward to defend towards mid-on
Kapugedera takes a step forward and drives firmly towards mid-on where Harbhajan fields
short of a length delivery outside off stump, the ball seams away from the right-hander and Kapugedera lets it go
short of a length outside off stump, Jayawardene uses the room created by the angle across him from over the wicket to cut towards third man
Irfan pitches the ball just outside off stump and straightens it into the right-hander, Kapugedera defends towards mid-off from his crease
Kapugedera opens the face and guides the ball towards third man
good length delivery on off and middle, defended off the back foot towards the leg side
Jayawardene pushes away from his body without moving his feet and gets beaten by a delivery that slants across the right-hander
fantastic shot, Jayawardene moves towards the line of the ball, which slants across him, and drives off the back foot through the small gap between point and backward point
good length from Munaf around off stump, Kapugedera defends on the off side, Dhoni's given Munaf his ninth over
played off the pads towards deep square leg for a single
short of a length delivery angling into the right-hander, Jayawardene moves forward and plays the ball towards point
shot! Jayawardene moves forward with grace and drives a full ball past the fielder at mid-off who dives to his left but cannot stop the ball from racing to the boundary
defended on the back foot towards the off side
Jayawardene stays in his crease and steers a short of a length ball towards third man
good length delivery on off stump, Jayawardene moves forward and defends
short and wide outside off stump, that's loose and Jayawardene dispatches the ball to the backward point boundary with a powerful cut
tucked off the pads towards midwicket for a single
good length ball on off stump, pushed off the front foot towards cover
width offered outside off once again but Kapugedera can't beat point with his cut
good length delivery on off stump, defended on the back foot towards the off side
good length on middle and leg, Jayawardene pushes it towards the leg side for a single
good length delivery on off stump, defended on the front foot towards the off side
he angles a good length ball into the right-hander, Kapugedera defends on the front foot
Zaheer strays down leg side this time, it hasn't been called wide
good length outdid the off stump, Kapugedera moves back and pushes on the off side
another one strays past leg stump, this time Doctrove calls it wide
defended on the front foot towards the off side
full ball outside off stump, Jayawardene strides forward and drives towards cover
Jayawardene moves back and defends a good length ball on the leg side
full length on middle and leg, played off the pads towards midwicket
Jayawardene moves forward and drives a good length ball towards cover
Pathan bowls too straight, Jayawardene hops across in his crease and glances the ball off his pads to the fine-leg boundary, poor line
defended on the back foot towards the leg side
Kapugedera strides forward to a full ball and drives through the gap at cover, three fielders give chase but the ball opens up a lead quickly and speeds to teh boundary
driven off the back foot towards cover
Kapugedera moves deep in his crease to play the ball on the leg side but misses and gets an inside edge on to his pad
good length delivery on middle and leg, Jayawardene moves forward and defends towards mid-on
Jayawardene drops the ball with soft hands towards the off side and responds quickly to Kapugedera's call for a single
Jayawardene flicks the ball off his pads towards square leg
short of a length outside off stump, Kapugedera cuts down to third man for a single
Pathan strays down leg side with a short of a length delivery and that's another wide
good length delivery on off stump, punched off the front foot towards mid-off
Jayawardene moves across his stumps and nudges the ball towards midwicket for a single
banged in short but Pathan has no pace and Kapugedera has plenty of time to pull the ball towards deep midwicket

Jayawardene drops the ball with soft hands towards the off side and wants the single, Kapugedera sends him back, Yuvraj runs in and underarms the ball back at the stumps, Jayawardene would have been out had he hit
Kapugedera takes a step down and closes the face to play the ball towards square leg
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Harbhajan strays too far down leg side and concedes a wide
played off the pads towards square leg for a single
Kapugedera moves back and plays a flat delivery towards cover
Kapugedera closes the face of the bat and gets a leading edge which lobs tantalisingly close to Harbhajan but doesn't quite carry
Jayawardene tries to flick but misses, the ball hits his pad and the batsmen run a leg bye
short of a length on leg and middle, Kapugedera gets tucked up on the back foot and is hit high on the thigh
cut off the back foot towards third man, these two have now added 51 off 64 balls
worked off the hips towards midwicket for a single
short ball outside the off stump, Kapugedera uses the pace of the ball and guides it towards the third man boudnary
Kapugedera stays in his crease and defends the ball towards point
flighted delivery on middle stump, Jayawardene moves forward and nudges towards the leg side
defended on the front foot towards the off side
worked off the pads towards midwicket for one more
defended on the front foot on the off side
loud appeal for lbw as the batsman gets hit low on the front pad, the impact was outside off stump
played towards cover point off the front foot
tossed up from roudn the wicket, Kapugedera steps out and drives towards wide long on for a single
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, Jayawardene waits on the front foot and defends

loud and confident appeal for lbw from Dhoni, Ojha bowled a quicker one that drew Jayawardene forward and then spun past the outside edge, Dhoni whipped off the bails but Jayawardene's back foot was safely grounded
Jayawardene comes forward and drives the ball with the turn through cover

the straighter one goes on to hit Kapugedera on the front pad, that pitched in line and hit him in line, perhaps the height was an issue, Kapugedera was playing for the turn and there was none, Ojha had a strong case for lbw
driven to long off for a single
flicked off the pads through the leg side for a single
Jayawardene leans forward and closes the face to work the ball through midwicket for a single
tossed up outside off stump, the batsman leans forward and defends
defended on the back foot on the off side
Kapugedera leans forward and defends on the off side, he's pushed it into the gap and will get the single
terrific footwork, Kapugedera skips down to track to get to the pitch of the ball and drives firmly through extra cover for four
pulled through midwicket for a single
Kapugedera leans forward and nudges the ball towards midwicket
Jayawardene moves back and defends a flat and quick delivery towards cover
tossed up outside off stump, Jayawardene strides forward and drives the ball towards deep cover
the flighted delivery stops a touch on Jayawardene who stays in his crease and defends
Jayawardene cuts off the back foot towards point
defended back towards the bowler
Kapugedera moves forward and clips the ball off his pads towards deep backward square leg
bowled faster outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
worked off the pads into the gap at square leg
bowled flat and straight on off stump, defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Jayawardene leans forward to a flighted delivery and flicks the ball off his pads towards deep square leg
Kapugedera steps out of the crease, realises he isn't in a position to play a  shot and pads it away in the end
cut off the back foot towards third man
played towards cover on the back foot
tossed up on off stump, the ball turns away from the right-hander and Kapugedera lets it go
pushed off the front foot towards point
defended back towards the bowler on the front foot
flicked off the pads through square leg for a single
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
swept behind square for a single to deep backward square leg
pushed into the gap at cover for a single
defended on the back foot towards midwicket
loud shout for lbw as Kapugedera misses the sweep, he might have been struck outside off stump
pushed to mid on off the front foot
Jayawardene reaches 50 by cutting the ball through cover point, well played!
cut off the back foot to deep point
defended off the front foot towards midwicket
Jayawardene waits on the back foot and cuts the ball towards third man
driven towards long on for a single
played off the pads behind square for a single
defended back to the bowler
Kapugedera drives off the front foot towards long off
Jayawardene moves back and pulls the ball towards deep square leg
defended on the leg side off the front foot
Jayawardene steps forward and works a flighted delivery towards midwicket
pushed off the front foot towards midwicket once again
Jayawardene moves forward and towards the line of a tossed up delivery outside off stump and drives towards cover
pushed towards long on for one more
width offered outside off stump and Jayawardene waits before cutting it late past the fielder at point for four more
hehe defended back to the bowler
driven towards long on for a single which brings up the 100-run stand
Jaywardene backs away to make room and gets beaten on the cut
pushed off the front foot towards midwicket and the batsmen stroll a single
Sri Lanka have won by eight wickets, Kapugedera scores the winning runs with a sweep to long leg,  the game was a no-contest from the second ball of the match with which Vaas bowled Gambhir
